20101201030232.000|20101201030234.500|CCO|CONCERNED ABOUT PEOPLE IN THE 
20101201030234.500|20101201030237.000|CCO|NEIGHBORHOOD SEEING THEM

20101201030239.500|20101201030242.000|CCO|IT'S ABOUT 80 OR 90 FEET FROM 
20101201030242.000|20101201030245.333|CCO|THE KITCHEN, FROM THE ENTRANCE 
20101201030245.333|20101201030248.667|CCO|DOWN THIS LADDER TO THE ACTUAL 
20101201030248.667|20101201030252.000|CCO|ENTRANCE TO THE TUNNEL.
20101201030252.000|20101201030253.429|CCO|WHAT'S REMARKABLE ABOUT THIS 
20101201030253.429|20101201030254.857|CCO|TUNNEL, ACCORDING TO 
20101201030254.857|20101201030256.286|CCO|AUTHORITIES, IS CHECK OUT THE

20101201030257.714|20101201030259.143|CCO|THEY'VE PUT CINDERBLOCK TO SHORE
20101201030259.143|20101201030300.571|CCO|UP THE WALLS HERE.
20101201030300.571|20101201030302.000|CCO|SO THEY'VE REALLY INVESTED A LOT
20101201030302.000|20101201030303.429|CCO|OF TIME AND A LOT OF MONEY 
20101201030303.429|20101201030304.857|CCO|PERHAPS EVEN MORE THAN $1 
20101201030304.857|20101201030306.286|CCO|MILLION, MAYBE EVEN $2 MILLION 
20101201030306.286|20101201030307.714|CCO|IN ORDER TO BUILD THIS TUNNEL.
20101201030307.714|20101201030309.143|CCO|MIGHT HAVE TAKEN THEM AS MUCH AS
20101201030309.143|20101201030310.571|CCO|A YEAR.
20101201030310.571|20101201030312.000|CCO|BUT I'VE NEVER SEEN -- I'VE BEEN
20101201030312.000|20101201030313.667|CCO|IN TWO OF THESE TUNNELS NOW, TWO
20101201030313.667|20101201030315.333|CCO|OF THE SOPHISTICATED TUNNELS 
20101201030315.333|20101201030317.000|CCO|OVER THE LAST COUPLE OF YEARS.
20101201030317.000|20101201030318.667|CCO|I'VE NEVER SEEN CINDERBLOCK 
20101201030318.667|20101201030320.333|CCO|WALLS USED LIKE THIS TO SHORE UP
20101201030320.333|20101201030322.000|CCO|ANY PART OF THE TUNNEL.
20101201030322.000|20101201030324.000|CCO|AND THEN THE OTHER THING THAT'S 
20101201030324.000|20101201030326.000|CCO|FASCINATING ABOUT THIS TUNNEL IS

20101201030328.000|20101201030330.000|CCO|ELECTRICITY, SO THERE'S ACTUALLY

20101201030338.250|20101201030339.500|CCO|PHONE SYSTEMS, TELEPHONES.
20101201030339.500|20101201030340.750|CCO|THIS ONE DOESN'T HAVE A 
20101201030340.750|20101201030342.000|CCO|TELEPHONE BUT WHAT IT DOES HAVE,
20101201030342.000|20101201030344.500|CCO|WHICH I'VE NEVER SEEN BEFORE AND
20101201030344.500|20101201030347.000|CCO|WHICH AUTHORITIES SAY IS ANOTHER
20101201030347.000|20101201030349.500|CCO|SIGN OF HOW SOPHISTICATED THIS 
20101201030349.500|20101201030352.000|CCO|IS, IS CARDS.

20101201030355.333|20101201030357.000|CCO|CAN LOAD DRUGS ON AND JUST PUSH

20101201030400.333|20101201030402.000|CCO|ONE ALREADY FURTHER DOWN.

20101201030412.000|20101201030414.000|CCO|YOU CAN SEE AGAIN, THEY REALLY

20101201030427.000|20101201030428.667|CCO|THAT THEY'VE CREATED.

20101201030430.333|20101201030432.000|CCO|EYE CAN SEE DOWN.

20101201030438.000|20101201030440.000|CCO|MAY ACTUALLY COLLAPSE ON THEM.
20101201030440.000|20101201030442.000|CCO|AGAIN, THIS TUNNEL GOES ABOUT 
20101201030442.000|20101201030443.667|CCO|HALF A MILE UNDERGROUND, ALL THE
20101201030443.667|20101201030445.333|CCO|WAY TO THE U.S. SIDE OF THE 
20101201030445.333|20101201030447.000|CCO|BORDER.
20101201030447.000|20101201030448.667|CCO|IT'S ABOUT THE SIZE OF SEVEN 
20101201030448.667|20101201030450.333|CCO|FOOTBALL FIELDS.
20101201030450.333|20101201030452.000|CCO|AUTHORITIES BELIEVED IT WAS 
20101201030452.000|20101201030454.500|CCO|BUILT BY ONE OF THE MAJOR DRUG 
20101201030454.500|20101201030457.000|CCO|TRAFFICKING CARTELS OPERATING IN
20101201030457.000|20101201030459.500|CCO|MEXICO.
20101201030459.500|20101201030502.000|CCO|ON THE U.S. SIDE, THE TUNNEL, AS
20101201030502.000|20101201030503.667|CCO|IT GETS CLOSER AND CLOSER TO THE
20101201030503.667|20101201030505.333|CCO|EXIT POINT IN SAN DIEGO, IT 
20101201030505.333|20101201030507.000|CCO|ACTUALLY GETS A LOT SMALLER.
20101201030507.000|20101201030508.667|CCO|SO WHAT WAS PROBABLY 4 1/2 FEET 
20101201030508.667|20101201030510.333|CCO|IS NOW MAYBE WELL, ABOUT 3 1/2 
20101201030510.333|20101201030512.000|CCO|FEET.
20101201030512.000|20101201030513.429|CCO|SO IT GETS HARDER AND HARDER.
20101201030513.429|20101201030514.857|CCO|THERE'S STILL A TRACK ALL THE 
20101201030514.857|20101201030516.286|CCO|WAY, THE TRACK WHICH YOU SAW 
20101201030516.286|20101201030517.714|CCO|START IN MEXICO CONTINUES ALL 
20101201030517.714|20101201030519.143|CCO|THE WAY THROUGH TO THE U.S.
20101201030519.143|20101201030520.571|CCO|BUT IF YOU NOTICE THE WALLS 
20101201030520.571|20101201030522.000|CCO|HERE, THEY DON'T HAVE THE SAME 
20101201030522.000|20101201030523.667|CCO|KIND OF STRUCTURAL SUPPORT THAT 
20101201030523.667|20101201030525.333|CCO|THEY DID ON THE MEXICO SIDE.
20101201030525.333|20101201030527.000|CCO|U.S. AUTHORITIES BELIEVE THAT AS
20101201030527.000|20101201030528.667|CCO|THEY STARTED TO GET UNDERNEATH 
20101201030528.667|20101201030530.333|CCO|U.S. TERRITORY, STARTED GETTING 
20101201030530.333|20101201030532.000|CCO|CLOSER TO THEIR DESTINATION, 
20101201030532.000|20101201030533.667|CCO|PERHAPS THEY GREW MORE 
20101201030533.667|20101201030535.333|CCO|IMPATIENT, DIDN'T WANT TO MAKE A
20101201030535.333|20101201030537.000|CCO|LOT OF NOISE, SO THEY DIDN'T 
20101201030537.000|20101201030538.667|CCO|SPEND A LOT OF TIME SHORING UP 
20101201030538.667|20101201030540.333|CCO|THE SIDES OF THESE WALLS.
20101201030540.333|20101201030542.000|CCO|AND ABOUT HALF A MILE FROM WHERE
20101201030542.000|20101201030544.000|CCO|THE TUNNEL BEGAN IN THAT HOUSE 
20101201030544.000|20101201030546.000|CCO|IN MEXICO WE COME TO JUST ABOUT 
20101201030546.000|20101201030548.000|CCO|THE END OF THE TUNNEL HERE.
20101201030548.000|20101201030550.000|CCO|WE'RE STILL ABOUT 70 FEET BELOW 
20101201030550.000|20101201030552.000|CCO|GROUND AT THIS POINT.
20101201030552.000|20101201030553.429|CCO|BUT THIS IS A LARGE ROOM THAT 
20101201030553.429|20101201030554.857|CCO|WAS CREATED THAT THEY CARVED OUT
20101201030554.857|20101201030556.286|CCO|OF THE EARTH.
20101201030556.286|20101201030557.714|CCO|CAN YOU SEE ALL THE JACKHAMMER 
20101201030557.714|20101201030559.143|CCO|MARKINGS HERE.
20101201030559.143|20101201030600.571|CCO|IT'S STILL ONLY ABOUT -- MAYBE 
20101201030600.571|20101201030602.000|CCO|THIS IS ABOUT FOUR FEET TALL.
20101201030602.000|20101201030604.000|CCO|THIS IS THE WIDEST PART OF THE 
20101201030604.000|20101201030606.000|CCO|TUNNEL THAT WE'VE SEEN.
20101201030606.000|20101201030608.000|CCO|IT'S ABOUT 15 FEET WIDE.
20101201030608.000|20101201030610.000|CCO|FOUND A LOT OF EQUIPMENT HERE.
20101201030610.000|20101201030612.000|CCO|THERE'S AN OLD HOE, HERE'S A 
20101201030612.000|20101201030613.429|CCO|DRILL THAT WAS USED BY THE 
20101201030613.429|20101201030614.857|CCO|TRAFFICKERS.
20101201030614.857|20101201030616.286|CCO|ALL THESE SANDBAGS, EMPTY 
20101201030616.286|20101201030617.714|CCO|SANDBAGS WHICH THEY WOULD USE, 
20101201030617.714|20101201030619.143|CCO|FILL UP WITH SOIL AND CART THE 
20101201030619.143|20101201030620.571|CCO|SOIL BACK TO THE MEXICO SIDE.
20101201030620.571|20101201030622.000|CCO|BUT FOR U.S. AUTHORITIES, OF 
20101201030622.000|20101201030624.000|CCO|MOST INTEREST WHAT THEY FOUND IN
20101201030624.000|20101201030626.000|CCO|THIS LARGE ROOM WAS THREE TONS 
20101201030626.000|20101201030628.000|CCO|OF MARIJUANA FOUND IN THIS ROOM 
20101201030628.000|20101201030630.000|CCO|AS WELL AS IN BUNDLES A LITTLE 
20101201030630.000|20101201030632.000|CCO|BIT FURTHER UP.
20101201030632.000|20101201030634.500|CCO|THE TUNNEL BEGINS TO MOVE UPWARD
20101201030634.500|20101201030637.000|CCO|TOWARD THE SURFACE IN THESE VERY
20101201030637.000|20101201030639.500|CCO|LARGE STEPS THAT HAVE BEEN 
20101201030639.500|20101201030642.000|CCO|BASICALLY HEWN OUT OF THE ROCK 
20101201030642.000|20101201030645.333|CCO|AND SOIL.
20101201030645.333|20101201030648.667|CCO|IT'S A VERY STEEP CLIMB, CLIMB 
20101201030648.667|20101201030652.000|CCO|ABOUT 70 FEET FROM THAT BIG ROOM
20101201030652.000|20101201030655.333|CCO|DOWNSTAIRS.
20101201030655.333|20101201030658.667|CCO|TO AN AREA PROBABLY TEN FEET OR 
20101201030658.667|20101201030702.000|CCO|SO AWAY FROM THE STREET LEVEL.
20101201030702.000|20101201030703.667|CCO|AND IT JUST GOES STRAIGHT UP.
20101201030703.667|20101201030705.333|CCO|THERE'S ACTUALLY AN AREA WHERE 
20101201030705.333|20101201030707.000|CCO|YOU CAN STAND UP FOR THE FIRST 
20101201030707.000|20101201030708.667|CCO|TIME, FULLY UPRIGHT.
20101201030708.667|20101201030710.333|CCO|IF YOU LOOK UP RIGHT UP HERE, 
20101201030710.333|20101201030712.000|CCO|THAT'S ACTUALLY THE BOTTOM OF A 
20101201030712.000|20101201030713.667|CCO|SIDEWALK RIGHT OUTSIDE THIS 
20101201030713.667|20101201030715.333|CCO|WAREHOUSE IN SAN DIEGO.

20101201033930.000|20101201033932.000|CCO|ADDED MORE.

20101201033933.500|20101201033935.000|CCO|AND HERE'S SOME IMPORTANT
